profileAlternative.name: Josh Cough
profileAlternative.headline: Lead Software Engineer at SimSpace Corporation
profileAlternative.summary:
A lover of functional programming, programming languages, compilers, large scale distributed systems, and open source development. In general, I'm a programmer with an insatiable desire for learning and tackling challenging problems.

Languages: Haskell (3.5 years), Scala (8 years), Ermine, Java (12+ years), F#, C#, JavaScript, NetLogo, Coq, Racket, x86-64, C, Clojure, Perl, Twelf, and more.

AWS experience includes: Lambda, Kinesis, Kinesis Streams, DynamoDB, DynamoDB Streams, EC2, S3, SQS, ELB, CloudWatch, and more.

aboutAlternative.text:
A lover of functional programming, programming languages, compilers, large scale distributed systems, and open source development. In general, I'm a programmer with an insatiable desire for learning and tackling challenging problems.

Languages: Haskell (3.5 years), Scala (8 years), Ermine, Java (12+ years), F#, C#, JavaScript, NetLogo, Coq, Racket, x86-64, C, Clojure, Perl, Twelf, and more.

AWS experience includes: Lambda, Kinesis, Kinesis Streams, DynamoDB, DynamoDB Streams, EC2, S3, SQS, ELB, CloudWatch, and more.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
Lead Dev on several projects. Responsibilities included:

Architecting new features, running sprints and standups, making sure work was properly broken up and specced out before estimation meetings, clearing any obstacles to for daily work, and especially for deployments, implementing, deploying and maintaining new and existing microservices, bug fixes, etc.

Techs: Haskell (especially Servant), Purescript, Microservices on AWS ECS, Postgres, React, Terraform
…
see more

positions.title: Boston Haskell Founder / Organizer
positions.description: Founded Boston Haskell (http://www.meetup.com/Boston-Haskell) with Dan Doel and Ed Kmett. Dan has since taken the lead role as organizer.

positions.title: Lead Software Engineer
positions.description: Designed and implemented the Flare Query Language. Flare queries search for patterns across time in streams of unstructured JSON data. Implemented the parser, interpreter, compiler and REPL in Haskell.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
Teaching Scala and Functional Programming in general. Hardening our backend infrastructure to be more scalable, and fault tolerant while increasing to over 3 billion data points per day. AWS services used include Lambda, Kinesis, Kinesis Streams, DynamoDB, DynamoDB Streams, EC2, S3, SQS, ELB, and CloudWatch. Other technologies, libraries, and services include Hysterix, Librato, New Relic, Scala, scalaz, Akka, Play, Spark and more.
…
see more

positions.title: Lead Developer
positions.description: Worked on a team that designed, implemented, and shipped the next generation financial reporting framework at S&P, which included implementing a Haskell-like language for the JVM called Ermine. Duties include design and implementation of the Ermine standard library, the reporting API, and much more. Programming languages used include Scala, Haskell, Ermine, F#, C#, Java, Javascript.

positions.title: Language Designer and Developer
positions.description:
Co-designed, implemented, and documented NetLogo 5.0. The major release included several new language features such as Lambda, Internationalization, radical HubNet changes, a new Wiki style documentation system, and a redesign of the plotting system.

Maintained NetLogo 4.1.x line, and managed and mentored undergraduate students working on various NetLogo projects including an Android HubNet client.
…
see more

positions.title: Senior Engineer
positions.description:
Team lead on the design and implementation of a number of low latency, highly concurrent financial messaging protocols and a pluggable protocol API.

Leadership duties including leading design discussions and planning meetings, code review, quality control. Responsible for technical introduction of Agile Development. Implemented test frameworks and taught developers about unit testing. Introduced and implemented Continuous Integration. Introduced a Friday lunch-and-learn session where we discussed a number of technologies and programming languages.
…
see more

peopleAlsoViewed.text: I lead the fastest growing community of minority entrepreneurs (while entrepreneur-ing).

Product Marketing & Experience Strategy | Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Salesforce + Startups
